languages.text: "Единица Оптикон-22 передает вам свои официальные приветствия и приглашает для беседы".
"Unit Opticon-22 extends his official greetings and invites you to a synchronous communication."
languages.original_text: "Единица Оптикон-22 передает вам свои официальные приветствия и приглашает для беседы".

traits.locale_text: "Unit Opticon-22 extends his official greetings and invites you to a synchronous communication."
"Unit Opticon-22 extends his official greetings and invites you to a synchronous communication."

languages.text: “奥普蒂孔22号向你致以正式问候，并邀请你进行同步通信。”
languages.original_text: "Unit Opticon-22 extends his official greetings and invites you to a synchronous communication."

traits.locale_text: “奥普蒂孔22号向你致以正式问候，并邀请你进行同步通信。”

languages.text: «La unidad Opticon-22 envía saludos oficiales y le invita a una comunicación sincronizada».
languages.original_text: "Unit Opticon-22 extends his official greetings and invites you to a synchronous communication."

traits.locale_text: «La unidad Opticon-22 envía saludos oficiales y le invita a una comunicación sincronizada».

languages.text: 「ユニット・オプティコン-22がご挨拶します。同期通信へようこそ」
languages.original_text: "Unit Opticon-22 extends his official greetings and invites you to a synchronous communication."

traits.locale_text: 「ユニット・オプティコン-22がご挨拶します。同期通信へようこそ」

languages.text: "Einheit Opticon-22 entbietet Euch offizielle Grüße und lädt Euch zu einer synchronen Kommunikation ein."
languages.original_text: "Unit Opticon-22 extends his official greetings and invites you to a synchronous communication."

traits.locale_text: "Einheit Opticon-22 entbietet Euch offizielle Grüße und lädt Euch zu einer synchronen Kommunikation ein."

languages.text: « L'unité Opticon-22 vous salue officiellement et vous invite à une communication simultanée. »
languages.original_text: "Unit Opticon-22 extends his official greetings and invites you to a synchronous communication."

traits.locale_text: « L'unité Opticon-22 vous salue officiellement et vous invite à une communication simultanée. »

languages.text: "Birim Opticon-22 sizi resmî olarak selamlıyor ve senkronize iletişime davet ediyor."
languages.original_text: "Unit Opticon-22 extends his official greetings and invites you to a synchronous communication."

traits.locale_text: "Birim Opticon-22 sizi resmî olarak selamlıyor ve senkronize iletişime davet ediyor."
